trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Loveland
There were no other sightings in Loveland on or around September 3rd 2010
divs: sighting details i went to the back porch for a smoke and about a minute after looking up i saw something unusual. i first noticed the lights moving at a great speed. the first thing i thought was satelite, it was too fast. there were 3-4 lights on each side making a triangle, might have been 3 with two in back. the first thing i thought was *(words deleted--sgonzalez\cms). then i had to call my wife. of course i knew she whould not belive me but whatever. i lost sight over a set of trees to the west of me.
